subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Defensive tackle Tank Johnson's serious off-field issues have tarnished the Bears’ public image, but he will be counted on to help Chicago to its first Super Bowl berth since the 1985 season.
snippet: Defensive tackle Tank Johnson's serious off-field issues have tarnished the Bears’ public image, but he will be counted on to help Chicago to its first Super Bowl berth since the 1985 season.
